thread.title: Beyonce's Pregnancy Rumors Come Out True, She's Indeed Expecting TWINS!
thread.title_full: Beyonce's Pregnancy Rumors Come Out True, She's Indeed Expecting TWINS!

author: Kunal Kumrawat
title: Beyonce's Pregnancy Rumors Come Out True, She's Indeed Expecting TWINS!
text:
IN Celebrities ON 02 Feb, 2017 Beyonce's Pregnancy Rumors Come Out True, She's Indeed Expecting TWINS! Share on twitter Follow Us On 
Beyonce and her husband Jay-Z said "We have been blessed two times over," using their social media account to announce that couple is expecting twins. 
They wrote in their recent post that "We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two," they wrote, and "we thank you for your kind wishes." 
The 35-year-old announced the news on social media, the musician and her husband Jay-Z are previously parents to a five-year-old Blue Ivy. She did not announce her due date, but her bump hints that she should be four to five months along. 
She is scheduled to headline Coachella in April. Rihanna and Rita Ora were among the celebrities to compliment the couple. Beyonce's Pregnancy Rumors Come Out True, She's Indeed Expecting TWINS! 754 396 in Celebrities beyonce beyonce-pregnant beyonce-twins In the ethereal frame, she wore a veil on over her face while surrounded by flowers Loading... 
Twin joy! Beyonce finally disclosed that she is expecting twins in a note to her fans on Instagram on Wednesday. She put her bump on display while wearing just lingerie and a veil. Her choice of blue panties and a pink bra lead fans to speculate she's expecting a boy and a girl. 
Related: Beyonce In Bikini Celebrating Jay-Z's Birthday In Ireland . Beyonce revealed in 2013 that she had suffered a miscarriage before the birth of her daughter. 
She said at the time: "About two years ago, I was pregnant for the first time. And I heard the heartbeat, which was the most beautiful music I ever heard in my life. I picked out names. I envisioned what my child would look like. I was feeling very maternal. I flew back to New York to get my checkup and no heartbeat. Literally, the week before I went to the doctor, everything was fine, but there was no heartbeat," reports Daily Mail . She didn't stop here and added further: via 
"I went into the studio and wrote the saddest song I've ever written in my life. And it was the first song I wrote for my album. And it was the best form of therapy for me because it was the saddest thing I've ever been through," reports Daily Mail. Her latest performance... Loading... 
Staying mom: Beyonce was last pictured on stage only with Jay-Z, on November 4 while performing at a fundraiser campaign for Democratic U.S. presidential nominee Hillary Clinton. The news is already trending on the internet. Loading... 
And fans are now talking about everything that Beyonce has ever said about pregnancy like, while talking in her TV show 'Life Is But a Dream,' Beyonce had said: "Being pregnant was very much like falling in love. You are so open. You are so overjoyed." 
"There are no words that can express having a baby growing inside of you, so of course you want to scream it out and tell everyone," she adds. 
Shortly after giving birth to Blue Ivy, Beyonce revealed in an interview with US Vogue that she wanted more children. 
Beyonce said, "When I was younger, there were moments where I said, "I'm not going to have kids," and then there were moments when I wanted four. And now I want another, but I don't know when," say reports. Singer/songwriter Rihanna copied Beyonce's picture to wish her luck on Instagram. Loading... 
Our @badgalriri wrote in her post: "so excited about this news!!!! Congratulations to you @Beyonce and my big brother Jay!!!!" 
Related: Rihanna And Beyonce Turned Nastier In These Revealing Pictures Model Hailey Baldwin looked more excited than Beyonce. 
She took to Twitter and wished Beyonce. Though, it all turned hilarious when some of her followers trolled her for the same. It looked as if Hollywood is more excited for this picture than Beyonce's pregnancy itself. 
Just like Rihanna, Rita Ora on Twitter shared this 'viral' pregnancy picture of Beyonce to congratulate her. Beyonce has certainly spread happiness all around. 
Everyone looks happy with this news, although a few days back when her pregnancy rumors were swirling , no one believed that it could be true. 
Happy Pregnancy, Beyonce.
